articles.title: Apple introduces the Apple Watch SE, a cheaper Apple Watch
articles.description: In addition to keeping old generation devices at an entry-level price, Apple is introducing a brand new Apple Watch at a cheaper price point. The new Apple Watch SE features the same design as the newly announced Apple Watch Series 6. But it costs $279. “The …

articles.author: Billy Steele
articles.title: Apple One bundle offers Arcade, Music, TV+ and iCloud for $15 a month
articles.description: At its September event today, Apple officially announced its “Apple One” subscription bundle: a combination of Apple Arcade, Apple Music, Apple TV+ and iCloud (50GB) for $14.95 a month.  It’s $19.95 per month, but it includes 200GB of iCloud storage.  If you …
